text: condominium instruments amendment of instruments amend rsa ii to read as follows if there is any unit owner other than the declarant then the condominium instruments shall be amended only by agreement of unit owners of units to which of the votes in the unit owners association appertain or such larger majority as the condominium instruments may specify except in cases for which this chapter provides different methods of amendment the procedures established in rsa v shall be followed for amendments to extend the time limits for conversion expansion or contraction of a condominium notwithstanding the foregoing condominium fees shall be amended only by agreement of unit owners of units to which a majority of the votes in the unit owners association appertain condominium act adoption of special assessments amend rsa ii to read as follows the board of directors at any time may propose a special assessment except as otherwise provided in paragraph iii the assessment is effective only if the board of directors follows the procedures for ratification of a budget described in paragraph i and the unit owners do not reject the proposed assessment
